message: I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you, Bob. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a very competitive price, considering its value to you is $1000000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a serious offer. What do you think?
